T02D1432:222b-1: shr'i tsakra sam ba ra s'a dha nam /
T02D1432:222b-3: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D1432:222b-4: dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1432:222b-5: 'gro kun don la rab gzhol ba'i //
T02D1432:222b-6: rang rgyud sngags dang rnal 'byor shes //
T02D1432:222b-7: phyi rol rnam rtog spangs nas ni //
T02D1432:222b-8: dam tshig mnyam nyid rnal 'byor che /
T02D1432:222b-9: nang par sad pa dang mal nas langs te /
T02D1432:222b-10: rnal 'byor dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su /
T02D1432:222b-12: bdud rtsi'i ril bu khar bcug la shr'i he ru ka zhes bya ba'i don dran par byas te /
T02D1432:222b-13: snying gar zla ba la dpal mchog dang po'i yi
T02D1432:222b-14: ge ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin can 'od zer dang
T02D1432:222b-15: bcas pa'o // des sgo gsum gyi dri ma'ang sbyang ngo //
T02D1432:223a-1: bskul nas phyag btsal rang lus gzhug / rkang pa sum mdor lte snying ga //
T02D1432:223a-2: rlung dang me chu sa yin no //
T02D1432:223a-3: sgal tshigs ri rgyal de bzhin te //
T02D1432:223a-4: lus ni mnyam pa sgo bzhi rlung //
T02D1432:223a-5: rgyan rnams rab mdzes he ru ka'i //
T02D1432:223a-7: aindra n'i la mtshungs pa'i mdog / zhal bzhi re re spyan gsum pa //
T02D1432:223a-8: rtsa ba'i lus mdog ljang dang dmar //
T02D1432:223a-9: gser gyi 'od ltar gtsigs pa po //
T02D1432:223a-10: ral pa'i thor tshugs zla bas brgyan //
T02D1432:223a-11: thod phreng sna tshogs rdo rje bcas //
T02D1432:223a-12: rdo rje dril bus yang dag 'khyud //
T02D1432:223a-13: gnyis kyis glang po'i pags pa bsnams //
T02D1432:223a-14: g-yas kyi lag na da ma ru //
T02D1432:223a-15: dgra sta gri gug rtse gsum pa //
T02D1432:223a-16: g-yon na kha tv'am ga thod pa //
T02D1432:223a-17: zhags pa tshangs pa'i mgo bo bsnams //
T02D1432:223a-18: g-yas brkyang pa yi gar gyis ni //
T02D1432:223a-19: 'jigs byed dus mtshan mnyam par mnan //
T02D1432:223a-20: stag lpags bsnams dkris mgo phreng can //
T02D1432:223a-21: nyams dgu rgyan drug gis btab pa'o //
T02D1432:223a-22: bam las 'khyud pa'i bcom ldan yum //
T02D1432:223a-23: zhal gcig spyan gsum dmar 'bar ba //
T02D1432:223a-24: skra grol dum bu'i rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02D1432:223a-25: byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khyud //
T02D1432:223a-26: g-yon pas 'khyud cing thod pa dag / gdug pa bdud kyi khrag gis gang //
T02D1432:223a-27: g-yas pa rtag tu sdigs mdzub dang //
T02D1432:223a-28: ma rungs pa yi gri gug bsnams //
T02D1432:223a-29: bde chen thugs rje'i rang bzhin can //
T02D1432:223a-30: kha sbyor phyi nyid legs shes pas //
T02D1432:223a-31: thugs su aa wa dh'u t'i h'um //
T02D1432:223a-32: ma bcos nang gi bdag nyid do //
T02D1432:223a-33: mkha' 'gro l'a ma dum skyes ma //
T02D1432:223a-34: gzugs can ma ste bzhi rnams kyang //
T02D1432:223a-35: zhal mdog dang mtshungs kha tv'am snod //
T02D1432:223a-36: gri dang phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan //
T02D1432:223a-37: mchod pa bzhi yi rang bzhin rtsa //
T02D1432:223a-38: phyogs bral bde chen 'khor lo ste //
T02D1432:223a-39: mam lam pam tam h'um brgyad kyang //
T02D1432:223a-40: dam tshig cig car bshad pa yin //
T02D1432:223a-56: ma ku 'di dag gnas su rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1432:223a-57: rtsa yin dpa' bo nyi shu bzhi //
T02D1432:223a-58: lus kyi khams su brtag par bya //
T02D1432:223a-59: de dag kyang gang zhe na /
T02D1432:223b-0: spyi bor khanda ka p'a li dang rab @223b tu gtum mo //
T02D1432:223b-1: spyi gtsug tu ma h'a kam ka la dang gtum pa'i mig can ma'o //
T02D1432:223b-2: rna ba g-yas par kang ka la dang /
T02D1432:223b-4: ltag par mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang /
T02D1432:223b-5: sna chen ma ste gnas so //
T02D1432:223b-6: rna ba g-yon par su ra bee ri dang /
T02D1432:223b-8: smin ma'i mtshams su aa mi t'a bh'a dang mi thur ma'o //
T02D1432:223b-9: mig tu rdo rje'i 'od dang langka'i dbang phyug ma'o //
T02D1432:223b-10: phrag par rdo rje'i sku dang /
T02D1432:223b-11: shing grib ni nye ba'i gnas te /
T02D1432:223b-12: thugs kyi 'khor lo nam mkha' la spyod pa mdog sngon po'o //
T02D1432:223b-13: mchan khung du myu gu can dang sa srungs ma'o //
T02D1432:223b-14: nu mar rdo rje ral pa can dang /
T02D1432:223b-15: 'jigs byed chen mo ste zhing ngo //
T02D1432:223b-16: lte bar dpa' bo chen po dang rlung gi shugs can ma'o //
T02D1432:223b-17: sna rtser badzra h'um ka ra dang /
T02D1432:223b-18: chang 'thung ma ste nye ba'i zhing ngo //
T02D1432:223b-19: khar rab tu bzang po dang shy'a ma de bi'o //
T02D1432:223b-20: mgrin par rdo rje bzang po dang /
T02D1432:223b-21: shin tu bzang mo ste tshando ha'o ;
T02D1432:223b-22: / snying gar 'jigs byed chen po dang rta rna ma'o /
T02D1432:223b-23: mdoms par mig mi bzang dang /
T02D1432:223b-24: bya gdong ma ste nye ba'i tshando ha ste gsung
T02D1432:223b-25: gi 'khor lo sa la spyod pa mdog dmar po'o
T02D1432:223b-26: // mtshan ma la stobs po che dang /
T02D1432:223b-28: bshang lam du rin chen rdo rje dang khanda ro hi ste 'dus pa can na //
T02D1432:223b-31: byin par nam mkha'i snying po dang tsakra war mi ni ste nye ba'i 'dus pa can no //
T02D1432:223b-32: sor mo rnams la shr'i he ru ka dang shin tu dpa' mo'o //
T02D1432:223b-33: bol gong du padma gar gyi dbang phyug dang stobs chen ma ste dur khrod do //
T02D1432:223b-34: mthe bong la rnam par snang byed dang tsakra warti ni'o //
T02D1432:223b-35: pus mo gnyis la rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02D1432:223b-36: brtson 'grus chen mo ni nye ba'i dur khrod do //
T02D1432:223b-37: sku yi 'khor lo sa 'og na spyod pa ste mdog dkar po'o //
T02D1432:223b-38: khanda ka p'a la la sogs pa'i dpa' bo rnams
T02D1432:223b-39: bcom ldan 'das kyi rnam pa ji lta ba bzhin
T02D1432:223b-40: te / 'on kyang zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'o //
T02D1432:223b-41: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams ni rdo rje phag mo'i rnam pa ji lta ba bzhin te /
T02D1432:223b-42: sa bcu yongs su dag pa rnams so //
T02D1432:223b-44: khyi dang phag gi gdong pa can rnams dang /
T02D1432:223b-47: mche ba can dang 'joms ma ste /
T02D1432:224a-1: phyogs dang mtshams su mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin te /
T02D1432:224a-2: mtshams kyi lha mo rnams ni 'on kyang gzugs gnyis ma'o //
T02D1432:224a-3: byang chub phyogs kyi rang bzhin can //
T02D1432:224a-4: me long gzugs brnyan bzhin gsol blta //
T02D1432:224a-5: de nas go cha gnyis shes nas //
T02D1432:224a-6: ye shes 'khor lo rnam par bsgom //
T02D1432:224a-7: snying ga mgo bo spyi gtsug dang //
T02D1432:224a-8: phrag pa mig dang yan lag la //
T02D1432:224a-9: rdor sems snang mdzad gar dbang phyug / khrag 'thung nyi ma rta mchog bsam //
T02D1432:224a-10: lte ba snying ga kha spyi bo //
T02D1432:224a-11: spyi gtsug yan lag thams cad la //
T02D1432:224a-12: phag mo gshin rje rmongs byed ma //
T02D1432:224a-13: sbyin byed skrag byed gtum ma'o //
T02D1432:224a-14: aom ha na ma hi: sv'a h'a hu boo sha ta he h'um h'um ho phat ho phat ham /
T02D1432:224a-15: aom bam ham yom him mom hrem hrim h'um h'um phat phat /
T02D1432:224a-16: sngags dang phyag rgya sbyor ba yis //
T02D1432:224a-17: spyan drangs mchod nas rang lus gzhug / de bzhin rgyun ni dbang bskur nas //
T02D1432:224a-18: cod pan dang ni lhag pa'i lha //
T02D1432:224a-19: dza: h'um bam ho: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta
T02D1432:224a-20: aa bhi she ka sa ma ya shri ye h'um
T02D1432:224a-21: / aom shr'i badzra he he ru ru kam hum
T02D1432:224a-22: h'um phat phat d'a ki ni dz'a la sam ba
T02D1432:224a-23: / ra sv'a h'a / aom hri: ha ha hum h'um phat /
T02D1432:224a-24: snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o //
T02D1432:224a-25: aom badzra bee ro tsa n'a ye hum h'um phat /
T02D1432:224a-26: aom sarba buddh'a d'a ki n'i ye badzra warnna n'i ye hum h'um phat /
T02D1432:224a-27: bcom ldan 'das ma'i snying po dang /
T02D1432:224a-29: / rab tu 'bad nas mchod nas ni //
T02D1432:224a-30: dud chen phreng ba blang bya ste //
T02D1432:224a-31: ji srid skyo bar ma gyur pa //
T02D1432:224a-32: de srid du ni rab tu bzlas //
T02D1432:224a-33: bsam gtan mi nus rnal 'byor bas //
T02D1432:224a-34: go cha che la sogs bsrungs te //
T02D1432:224a-35: rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas //
T02D1432:224a-36: sems can kun las rab brtag bya //
T02D1432:224a-37: rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags bzlas shing //
T02D1432:224a-38: tshangs par spyod pa rtag tu bsam //
T02D1432:224a-39: zas kyi rdo rje sems sogs dang //
T02D1432:224a-40: snying ga'i dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg bya //
T02D1432:224a-41: zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin myangs bas //
T02D1432:224a-42: rtag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02D1432:224a-43: dam tshig legs sogs legs gnas pas //
T02D1432:224a-44: mtshan phyed gyur nas gtor ma sbyin //
T02D1432:224a-45: aom aa ralli ho: dza: h'um bam ho: badzra d'a
T02D1432:224a-46: ki n'i sa ma ya stvam dri shya ho: aom
T02D1432:224a-47: a'a: h'um kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi sarba yaksha
T02D1432:224a-48: raksha sa bh'u ta pre ta pi sh'a tsa aun
T02D1432:224a-49: ma da aa pa sm'a ra /
T02D1432:224a-50: badzra d'a ka d'a ki n+y'a da ya /
T02D1432:224a-51: ai mam ba lim grihnam tu sa ma ya rakshantu ma ma sarbba siddhimme pra ya tstsha ntu /
T02D1432:224b-0: @224b ya the bam ya thashtam bhunydza th'a /
T02D1432:224b-1: dzi gha th'a pi pa th'a m'a ti kra ma
T02D1432:224b-2: th'a ma ma sarba karta ya sa ta su kham
T02D1432:224b-3: bi brid dha ye sa ha yi ka bha bantu
T02D1432:224b-5: rtag tu snying la gnas pa yi //
T02D1432:224b-6: thig le gcig la 'gyur med de //
T02D1432:224b-7: de sgom byed pa'i skye bo la //
T02D1432:224b-8: nges par ye shes skye bar 'gyur //
T02D1432:224b-9: kha tv'am ga ni lha yi sku //
T02D1432:224b-10: shes rab d'a ma ru yi sgra //
T02D1432:224b-11: nyin mo bcom ldan rdo rje can //
T02D1432:224b-12: rnal 'byor ma ni mtshan mo bshad //
T02D1432:224b-13: gnyis med ye shes sems ldan la //
T02D1432:224b-14: mi bya ba ni ci yang med //
T02D1432:224b-15: 'jigs pa thams cad rnam spangs te //
T02D1432:224b-16: dpa' bo seng ge bzhin du spyod //
T02D1432:224b-17: mya ngan 'das byung dpa' bo rnams //
T02D1432:224b-18: sdug pa yid kyi sprul pa ste //
T02D1432:224b-19: dag pa chos kyi sprul pa ni //
T02D1432:224b-20: phag mo'i gzugs su bstan pa yin //
T02D1432:224b-21: sems la rnam gnas rnal 'byor pa //
T02D1432:224b-22: mya ngan 'das pa mi ston to //
T02D1432:224b-24: mkha' spyod pa yi gnas su khrid //
T02D1432:224b-25: de lta'i dpa' bo chen po dang //
T02D1432:224b-27: cho ga sna tshogs nyams dga' ba //
T02D1432:224b-28: bsam pa sna tshogs gzung ba'i phyir //
T02D1432:224b-29: rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs pa'i phyir //
T02D1432:224b-31: gang zhig de nyid yod gyur na //
T02D1432:224b-32: de dag thams cad grol ba'i rgyu //
T02D1432:224b-33: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi man ngag /
T02D1432:224b-34: phyag rgya chen po grub pa /
T02D1432:224b-35: dpal dril bu zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1432:224b-37: // / pande ta pradznya bha dra dang /
